title: BRIEF-Talisman Mining Says Saracen Entered Binding Agreement To Acquire Sinclair Project From Co
text:
BRIEF-Talisman Mining Says Saracen Entered Binding Agreement To Acquire Sinclair Project From Co

Commodities 42 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 09:10)

BRIEF-Talisman Mining Says Saracen Entered Binding Agreement To Acquire Sinclair Project From Co Sept 27 (Reuters) - Talisman Mining : * SARACEN ENTERED BINDING AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE SINCLAIR PROJECT FROM TALISMAN MINING * SARACEN AGREED TO PAY TALISMAN A$10M CASH AT COMPLETION * SINCLAIR PROJECT LOCATED 25KM SOUTH-WEST OF SARACEN'S THUNDERBOX PROJECT

BRIEF-Talisman Mining Says Saracen Entered Binding Agreement To Acquire Sinclair Project From Co
description: BRIEF-Talisman Mining Says Saracen Entered Binding Agreement To Acquire Sinclair Project From Co
